languages.text: И все же рассчеты не смогли учесть всех переменных — одна ошибка, и очередной взрыв происходит слишком близко к ледяному астероиду. Расколовшись на части, глыба ударяется об эльдарское судно и отшвыривает корабль навстречу еще не обезвреженным минам.

No amount of calculation can account for every single variable — a single mistake, and suddenly the next explosion detonates too close to an ice asteroid. Shattering into pieces, a block of ice crashes into the Aeldari vessel and sends it spinning into a cluster of still-active mines.
languages.original_text: И все же рассчеты не смогли учесть всех переменных — одна ошибка, и очередной взрыв происходит слишком близко к ледяному астероиду. Расколовшись на части, глыба ударяется об эльдарское судно и отшвыривает корабль навстречу еще не обезвреженным минам.

traits.locale_text: No amount of calculation can account for every single variable — a single mistake, and the next explosion happens too close to an ice asteroid. Shattering into pieces, a block of ice crashes into the Aeldari vessel and sends it spinning into a cluster of still-active mines.

No amount of calculation can account for every single variable — a single mistake, and the next explosion happens too close to an ice asteroid. Shattering into pieces, a block of ice crashes into the Aeldari vessel and sends it spinning into a cluster of still-active mines.

No amount of calculation can account for every single variable — a single mistake, and suddenly the next explosion detonates too close to an ice asteroid. Shattering into pieces, a block of ice crashes into the Aeldari vessel and sends it spinning into a cluster of still-active mines.

No amount of calculation can account for every single variable — a single mistake, and suddenly the next explosion detonates too close to an ice asteroid. Shattering into pieces, a block of ice crashes into the Aeldari vessel and sends it spinning into a cluster of still-active mines.

No amount of calculation can account for every single variable — a single mistake, and suddenly the next explosion detonates too close to an ice asteroid. Shattering into pieces, a block of ice crashes into the Aeldari vessel and sends it spinning into a cluster of still-active mines.

languages.text: 哪怕是再多的计算，也无法预测出每个变量。引爆过程突然出现了小小的失误，爆炸离某颗冰冻的小行星太近了。小行星被炸成了碎片，其中一块碎片撞上了艾达灵族的飞船，把它推入了仍处于活跃状态的雷区之中。
languages.original_text: No amount of calculation can account for every single variable — a single mistake, and suddenly the next explosion detonates too close to an ice asteroid. Shattering into pieces, a block of ice crashes into the Aeldari vessel and sends it spinning into a cluster of still-active mines.

traits.locale_text: 哪怕是再多的计算，也无法预测出每个变量。引爆过程突然出现了小小的失误，爆炸离某颗冰冻的小行星太近了。小行星被炸成了碎片，其中一块碎片撞上了艾达灵族的飞船，把它推入了仍处于活跃状态的雷区之中。

languages.text: どんなに計算しても、すべての変数を説明することはできない。突然、たったひとつのミスで、氷の小惑星にあまりに近い位置で次の爆発が起きてしまった。粉々に砕け散った氷の塊がアエルダリ船に衝突し、船は回転しながらまだ作動中の機雷群に突入する。
languages.original_text: No amount of calculation can account for every single variable — a single mistake, and suddenly the next explosion detonates too close to an ice asteroid. Shattering into pieces, a block of ice crashes into the Aeldari vessel and sends it spinning into a cluster of still-active mines.

traits.locale_text: どんなに計算しても、すべての変数を説明することはできない。突然、たったひとつのミスで、氷の小惑星にあまりに近い位置で次の爆発が起きてしまった。粉々に砕け散った氷の塊がアエルダリ船に衝突し、船は回転しながらまだ作動中の機雷群に突入する。

languages.text: Ningún cálculo puede tener en cuenta todas las variables: un solo error y, de repente, la siguiente explosión estalla demasiado cerca de un asteroide de hielo. Al romperse en pedazos, un bloque de hielo choca contra la nave Aeldari y la hace girar hacia un grupo de minas aún activas.
languages.original_text: No amount of calculation can account for every single variable — a single mistake, and suddenly the next explosion detonates too close to an ice asteroid. Shattering into pieces, a block of ice crashes into the Aeldari vessel and sends it spinning into a cluster of still-active mines.

traits.locale_text: Ningún cálculo puede tener en cuenta todas las variables: un solo error y, de repente, la siguiente explosión estalla demasiado cerca de un asteroide de hielo. Al romperse en pedazos, un bloque de hielo choca contra la nave Aeldari y la hace girar hacia un grupo de minas aún activas.

languages.text: Es ist unmöglich, jede mögliche Variable zu berechnen — ein einziger Fehler und plötzlich detoniert die nächste Explosion zu nah an einem Eisasteroiden. Der Asteroid zerspringt und ein Eisblock kracht in das Aeldari-Schiff. Er schubst es in Richtung eines Clusters noch aktiver Minen.
languages.original_text: No amount of calculation can account for every single variable — a single mistake, and suddenly the next explosion detonates too close to an ice asteroid. Shattering into pieces, a block of ice crashes into the Aeldari vessel and sends it spinning into a cluster of still-active mines.

traits.locale_text: Es ist unmöglich, jede mögliche Variable zu berechnen — ein einziger Fehler und plötzlich detoniert die nächste Explosion zu nah an einem Eisasteroiden. Der Asteroid zerspringt und ein Eisblock kracht in das Aeldari-Schiff. Er schubst es in Richtung eines Clusters noch aktiver Minen.

languages.text: Tous les calculs si savants soient-ils ne suffisent pas à prendre en compte les innombrables inconnues de l'équation. À la première erreur, l'explosion suivante se produit trop près d'un astéroïde qui se fragmente dans la foulée. Un bloc de glace percute le vaisseau aeldari et le projette tout droit dans un amas de mines encore actives.
languages.original_text: No amount of calculation can account for every single variable — a single mistake, and suddenly the next explosion detonates too close to an ice asteroid. Shattering into pieces, a block of ice crashes into the Aeldari vessel and sends it spinning into a cluster of still-active mines.

traits.locale_text: Tous les calculs si savants soient-ils ne suffisent pas à prendre en compte les innombrables inconnues de l'équation. À la première erreur, l'explosion suivante se produit trop près d'un astéroïde qui se fragmente dans la foulée. Un bloc de glace percute le vaisseau aeldari et le projette tout droit dans un amas de mines encore actives.

languages.text: Ne kadar hesaplama yapılsa da, her bir değişken hesaba katılamaz... Tek bir hatayla sıradaki patlama, bir anda buz asteroitlerinden birine fazla yakın gerçekleşiyor. Parçalara ayrılan asteroitten bir buz kütlesi, Aeldari gemisine çarpıp döne döne hâlâ aktif durumdaki bir mayın kümesine savrulmasına sebep oluyor.
languages.original_text: No amount of calculation can account for every single variable — a single mistake, and suddenly the next explosion detonates too close to an ice asteroid. Shattering into pieces, a block of ice crashes into the Aeldari vessel and sends it spinning into a cluster of still-active mines.
